a bid for an ERC721 token\r","params":{"_tokenAddress":"- address of the ERC721 token\r","_tokenId":"- uint256 of the token id\r"}},"getBidByBidder(address,uint256,address)":{"details":"Get the active bid id and index by a bidder and an specific token.\r","params":{"_bidder":"- address of the bidder\r","_tokenAddress":"- address of the ERC721 token\r","_tokenId":"- uint256 of the token id\r"},"return":"bidIndex - uint256 of the bid index to be used within bidsByToken mapping\rbidId - bytes32 of the bid id\rbidder - address of the bidder address\rprice - uint256 of the bid price\rexpiresAt - uint256 of the expiration time\r"},"getBidByToken(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Get an ERC721 token bid by index\r","params":{"_index":"- uint256 of the index\r","_tokenAddress":"- address of the ERC721 token\r","_tokenId":"- uint256 of the token id\r"},"return":"bytes32 of the bid id\raddress of the bidder address\ruint256 of the bid price\ruint256 of the expiration time\r"},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Used as the only way to accept a bid.\r The token owner should send the token to this contract using safeTransferFrom.\r The last parameter (bytes) should be the bid id.\r","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format\r","_from":"The address which previously owned the token\r","_tokenId":"The NFT identifier which is being transferred\r"}},"placeBid(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Place a bid for an ERC721 token\r","params":{"_duration":"- uint256 of the duration in seconds for the bid\r","_price":"- uint256 of the price for the bid\r","_tokenAddress":"- address of the ERC721 token\r","_tokenId":"- uint256 of the token id\r"}},"removeExpiredBids(address[],uint256[],address[])":{"details":"Remove expired bids\r","params":{"_bidders":"- address[] of the bidders\r","_tokenAddresses":"- address[] of the ERC721 tokens\r","_tokenIds":"- uint256[] of the token ids\r"}},"setOwnerCutPerMillion(uint256)":{"details":"Sets the share cut for the owner of the contract that's\r charged to the seller on a successful sale\r","params":{"_ownerCutPerMillion":"- Share amount, from 0 to 999,999\r"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"getBidByBidder(address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"If the bidder has not a valid bid, the transaction will be reverted.\r"},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"The ERC721 smart contract calls this function on the recipient\r after a `safetransfer`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the\r transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the\r transaction being reverted.\r Note:\r Contract address is always the message sender.\r This method should be seen as 'acceptBid'.\r It validates that the bid id matches an active bid for the bid token.\r"},"placeBid(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Tokens can have multiple bids by different users.\r Users can have only one bid per token.\r If the user places a bid and has an active bid for that token,\r the older one will be replaced with the new one.\r This function would be called by the bidder : Transfer msg.value to contract address\r"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/D/SoluLab/XinFin/Matic Nft cancelBid(address,uint256).details: Cancel a bid for an ERC721 token

getBidByBidder(address,uint256,address).details: Get the active bid id and index by a bidder and an specific token.
getBidByBidder(address,uint256,address).return: bidIndex - uint256 of the bid index to be used within bidsByToken mappingbidId - bytes32 of the bid idbidder - address of the bidder addressprice - uint256 of the bid priceexpiresAt - uint256 of the expiration time

getBidByToken(address,uint256,uint256).details: Get an ERC721 token bid by index
getBidByToken(address,uint256,uint256).return: bytes32 of the bid idaddress of the bidder addressuint256 of the bid priceuint256 of the expiration time

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Used as the only way to accept a bid. The token owner should send the token to this contract using safeTransferFrom. The last parameter (bytes) should be the bid id.

params._data: Additional data with no specified format
params._from: The address which previously owned the token
params._tokenId: The NFT identifier which is being transferred

placeBid(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Place a bid for an ERC721 token

params._duration: - uint256 of the duration in seconds for the bid
params._price: - uint256 of the price for the bid

setOwnerCutPerMillion(uint256).details: Sets the share cut for the owner of the contract that's charged to the seller on a successful sale

getBidByBidder(address,uint256,address).notice: If the bidder has not a valid bid, the transaction will be reverted.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: The ERC721 smart contract calls this function on the recipient after a `safetransfer`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted. Note: Contract address is always the message sender. This method should be seen as 'acceptBid'. It validates that the bid id matches an active bid for the bid token.

placeBid(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Tokens can have multiple bids by different users. Users can have only one bid per token. If the user places a bid and has an active bid for that token, the older one will be replaced with the new one. This function would be called by the bidder : Transfer msg.value to contract address
